overview: Matt is co-founder and CEO of Rollbase responsible for product design and business operations. Before Rollbase he was co-founder and CEO of Recruitforce.com, which was acquired by Taleo in 2005 and subsequently by Oracle in 2012. Now known as Oracle Taleo Business Edition Cloud Service, the Recruitforce product is currently used by over 5,000 organizations worldwide. Matt is co-author of Manning’s Java books “Swing” and “Swing, 2nd edition” with Pavel Vorobiev. He has a BS in Mathematics from Bates College
